scripts.install: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: docker compose  -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker image prune -f
scripts.backend:dev: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.yml up -d && docker image prune -f
scripts.backend: docker compose -f ./docker/docker-compose.prod.yml up -d && docker image prune
scripts.seed: cd backend && npx prisma db push && npx prisma db seed
